grid.title: 活动列表
grid.sql: select a.*,customername,contactname,employeename from activities a left join customers b on a.customerid=b.customerid left join contacts c on a.contactid=c.contactid left join employees d on a.employeeid=d.employeeid
grid.datafields: [50]sysrowno/序号;[@c][72]createdate/活动日期;[200]activitytitle/活动主题;[180]activitytype/活动类型;[180]opportunity/相关机会;[220]customername/相关客户;[@c][120]contactname/联系人;[@c][120]employeename/相关员工;[@c][110]startdatetime/开始日期;[@c][110]enddatetime/结束日期;[@c][100]priority/优先级;activityid;customerid;contactid;employeeid;starttime;endtime;durationhours;reminderflag;remindertime;reminderminutes;recurrflag;frequency;validdays;closed;ispublic;filepath;filename;notes;creator;operator;createdate;updatedate;startdatetime;enddatetime;reviewer;comment;expense;profit;resultflag';

combo.name: province
combo.label: 所属省份：
combo.sql: select areaid as provinceid,areaname as province from areas where level=1

combo.name: city
combo.label: 所在城市：
combo.sql: select areaid as cityid,areaname as city,parentnodeid as provinceid from areas where level=2

combo.name: status

detailgrid.title: 联系人
detailgrid.sql: select a.*,b.areaname as province,c.areaname as city from contacts a left join areas b on a.provinceid=b.areaid join areas c on a.cityid=c.areaid
detailgrid.datafields: [50]sysrowno/序号;[120]contactid/联系人编码;[120]contactname/联系人姓名;[120]title/职务;[@c][50]gender/性别;[@c][72]birthdate/出生日期;[200]address/联系人地址;[100]province/所属省份;[100]city/所在城市;[60]zip/邮政编码;[120]homephone/家庭电话;[120]mobile/移动电话
